name: Mr Culi
description:
How to Plays:
- Just tap to jump
- Collide with wall to change direction
- Avoid space to fall down
- Collect coin to get bonus score
- Avoid touch to bomb

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Relax in few minutes
* Easy to play but hard to be master

Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
